ðŸ“– Summary: Skyvern is a Python-based tool that automates browser-based workflows using Large Language Models (LLMs) and computer vision. It offers a simple API to replace brittle automation solutions by enabling agents to understand and interact with websites visually, making them resilient to layout changes and capable of handling unseen websites.
